item.title: About
item.description: About this blog, me, and related links. About This Blog This blog is Kotet’s study notes. It may contains false information because I’m a beginner. The source of this site is in GitHub. If you find: Typo / grammatical errors Wrong Tags False information And other mistakes in this blog, Please create issue or pull request. Kotet No official pronunciation of “Kotet”. You can pronounce as you like. I drawn
